createStatement: CREATE TABLE UnitPromotions ('ID' integer primary key autoincrement , 'Type' text  not null unique , 'Description' text , 'Help' text , 'DisabledHelp' text , 'Button' text , 'PortraitIndex' integer default 9 , 'IconAtlas' text default 'ABILITY_ATLAS' , 'HotKey' text , 'HotKeyAlt' text , 'HotKeyPriority' integer default 0 , 'HotKeyPriorityAlt' integer default 0 , 'OrderPriority' integer default 0 , 'AltDown' boolean default 0 , 'AltDownAlt' boolean default 0 , 'ShiftDown' boolean default 0 , 'ShiftDownAlt' boolean default 0 , 'CtrlDown' boolean default 0 , 'CtrlDownAlt' boolean default 0 , 'Sound' text , 'CannotBeChosen' boolean default 0 , 'LostWithUpgrade' boolean default 0 , 'NotWithUpgrade' boolean default 0 , 'InstaHeal' boolean default 0 , 'Leader' boolean default 0 , 'Blitz' boolean default 0 , 'Amphib' boolean default 0 , 'River' boolean default 0 , 'EnemyRoute' boolean default 0 , 'RivalTerritory' boolean default 0 , 'MustSetUpToRangedAttack' boolean default 0 , 'RangedSupportFire' boolean default 0 , 'CanMoveAfterAttacking' boolean default 0 , 'AlwaysHeal' boolean default 0 , 'HealOutsideFriendly' boolean default 0 , 'HillsDoubleMove' boolean default 0 , 'RoughTerrainEndsTurn' boolean default 0 , 'IgnoreTerrainCost' boolean default 0 , 'HoveringUnit' boolean default 0 , 'FlatMovementCost' boolean default 0 , 'CanMoveImpassable' boolean default 0 , 'NoCapture' boolean default 0 , 'OnlyDefensive' boolean default 0 , 'NoDefensiveBonus' boolean default 0 , 'NukeImmune' boolean default 0 , 'HiddenNationality' boolean default 0 , 'AlwaysHostile' boolean default 0 , 'NoRevealMap' boolean default 0 , 'Recon' boolean default 0 , 'CanMoveAllTerrain' boolean default 0 , 'FreePillageMoves' boolean default 0 , 'AirSweepCapable' boolean default 0 , 'AllowsEmbarkation' boolean default 0 , 'EmbarkedAllWater' boolean default 0 , 'HealIfDestroyExcludesBarbarians' boolean default 0 , 'RangeAttackIgnoreLOS' boolean default 0 , 'CityAttackOnly' boolean default 0 , 'CaptureDefeatedEnemy' boolean default 0 , 'HealOnPillage' boolean default 0 , 'IgnoreGreatGeneralBenefit' boolean default 0 , 'IgnoreZOC' boolean default 0 , 'HasPostCombatPromotions' boolean default 0 , 'PostCombatPromotionsExclusive' boolean default 0 , 'RangedAttackModifier' integer default 0 , 'InterceptionCombatModifier' integer default 0 , 'InterceptionDefenseDamageModifier' integer default 0 , 'AirSweepCombatModifier' integer default 0 , 'ExtraAttacks' integer default 0 , 'ExtraNavalMovement' integer default 0 , 'VisibilityChange' integer default 0 , 'MovesChange' integer default 0 , 'MoveDiscountChange' integer default 0 , 'RangeChange' integer default 0 , 'InterceptChanceChange' integer default 0 , 'NumInterceptionChange' integer default 0 , 'EvasionChange' integer default 0 , 'CargoChange' integer default 0 , 'EnemyHealChange' integer default 0 , 'NeutralHealChange' integer default 0 , 'FriendlyHealChange' integer default 0 , 'SameTileHealChange' integer default 0 , 'AdjacentTileHealChange' integer default 0 , 'EnemyDamageChance' integer default 0 , 'NeutralDamageChance' integer default 0 , 'EnemyDamage' integer default 0 , 'NeutralDamage' integer default 0 , 'CombatPercent' integer default 0 , 'CityAttack' integer default 0 , 'CityDefense' integer default 0 , 'RangedDefenseMod' integer default 0 , 'HillsAttack' integer default 0 , 'HillsDefense' integer default 0 , 'OpenAttack' integer default 0 , 'OpenRangedAttackMod' integer default 0 , 'OpenDefense' integer default 0 , 'RoughAttack' integer default 0 , 'RoughRangedAttackMod' integer default 0 , 'RoughDefense' integer default 0 , 'AttackFortifiedMod' integer default 0 , 'AttackWoundedMod' integer default 0 , 'FlankAttackModifier' integer default 0 , 'NearbyEnemyCombatMod' integer default 0 , 'NearbyEnemyCombatRange' integer default 0 , 'UpgradeDiscount' integer default 0 , 'ExperiencePercent' integer default 0 , 'AdjacentMod' integer default 0 , 'AttackMod' integer default 0 , 'DefenseMod' integer default 0 , 'DropRange' integer default 0 , 'GreatGeneral' boolean default 0 , 'GreatAdmiral' boolean default 0 , 'GreatGeneralModifier' integer default 0 , 'GreatGeneralReceivesMovement' boolean default 0 , 'GreatGeneralCombatModifier' integer default 0 , 'FriendlyLandsModifier' integer default 0 , 'FriendlyLandsAttackModifier' integer default 0 , 'OutsideFriendlyLandsModifier' integer default 0 , 'HPHealedIfDestroyEnemy' integer default 0 , 'ExtraWithdrawal' integer default 0 , 'EmbarkExtraVisibility' integer default 0 , 'EmbarkDefenseModifier' integer default 0 , 'CapitalDefenseModifier' integer default 0 , 'CapitalDefenseFalloff' integer default 0 , 'CityAttackPlunderModifier' integer default 0 , 'ReligiousStrengthLossRivalTerritory' integer default 0 , 'TradeMissionInfluenceModifier' integer default 0 , 'TradeMissionGoldModifier' integer default 0 , 'GoldenAgeValueFromKills' integer default 0 , 'Sapper' boolean default 0 , 'HeavyCharge' boolean default 0 , 'LayerAnimationPath' text default NULL , 'TechPrereq' text default NULL , 'Invisible' text default NULL , 'SeeInvisible' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereq' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr1' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr2' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr3' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr4' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr5' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr6' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr7' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr8' text default NULL , 'PromotionPrereqOr9' text default NULL , 'PediaType' text , 'PediaEntry' text , CombatChange integer DEFAULT 0, IgnoreTerrainDamage boolean DEFAULT 0, IgnoreFeatureDamage boolean DEFAULT 0, ExtraTerrainDamage boolean DEFAULT 0, ExtraFeatureDamage boolean DEFAULT 0, MaxHitPointsChange integer DEFAULT 0, MaxHitPointsModifier integer DEFAULT 0, PartialHealOnPillage integer DEFAULT 0, AOEDamageOnPillage integer DEFAULT 0, MinimumRangeRequired integer DEFAULT 0, MaximumRangeRequired integer DEFAULT 0, MountedOnly boolean DEFAULT 0, AttackFullyHealedMod integer DEFAULT 0, AttackAbove50HealthMod integer DEFAULT 0, AttackBelowEqual50HealthMod integer DEFAULT 0, RangedFlankAttack boolean DEFAULT 0, ExtraFlankPower integer DEFAULT 0, SplashDamage integer DEFAULT 0, AOEDamageOnKill integer DEFAULT 0, AoEWhileFortified integer DEFAULT 0, AoEDamageOnMove integer DEFAULT 0, WorkRateMod integer DEFAULT 0, ReconChange integer DEFAULT 0, PromotionDuration integer DEFAULT 0, IsLostOnMove boolean DEFAULT 0, NegatesPromotion text REFERENCES UnitPromotions (Type), ForcedDamageValue integer DEFAULT 0, ChangeDamageValue integer DEFAULT 0, CannotBeCaptured boolean DEFAULT 0, CapturedUnitsConscripted boolean DEFAULT 0, BarbarianCombatBonus integer DEFAULT 0, MoraleBreakChance integer DEFAULT 0, BarbarianOnly boolean DEFAULT 0, CityStateOnly boolean DEFAULT 0, StrongerDamaged boolean DEFAULT 0, FightWellDamaged boolean DEFAULT 0, GeneralGoldenAgeExpPercent integer DEFAULT 0, IsNearbyPromotion boolean DEFAULT 0, NearbyRange integer DEFAULT 0, GiveDomain text REFERENCES Domains (Type), GiveCombatMod integer DEFAULT 0, GiveHPHealedIfEnemyKilled integer DEFAULT 0, GiveExperiencePercent integer DEFAULT 0, GiveOutsideFriendlyLandsModifier integer DEFAULT 0, GiveExtraAttacks integer DEFAULT 0, GiveDefenseMod integer DEFAULT 0, GiveInvisibility boolean DEFAULT 0, GiveOnlyOnStartingTurn boolean DEFAULT 0, NearbyCityCombatMod integer DEFAULT 0, NearbyFriendlyCityCombatMod integer DEFAULT 0, NearbyEnemyCityCombatMod integer DEFAULT 0, NearbyHealEnemyTerritory integer DEFAULT 0, NearbyHealNeutralTerritory integer DEFAULT 0, NearbyHealFriendlyTerritory integer DEFAULT 0, MountainsDoubleMove boolean DEFAULT 0, RiverDoubleMove boolean DEFAULT 0, EmbarkFlatCost boolean DEFAULT 0, DisembarkFlatCost boolean DEFAULT 0, NumRepairCharges integer DEFAULT 0, GetGroundAttackDamage integer DEFAULT 0, MilitaryCapChange integer DEFAULT 0, CombatBonusFromNearbyUnitClass text REFERENCES UnitClasses (Type), NearbyUnitClassBonusRange integer DEFAULT 0, NearbyUnitClassBonus integer DEFAULT 0, AirInterceptRangeChange integer DEFAULT 0, ConvertDomainUnit text REFERENCES Units (Type), ConvertDomain text REFERENCES Domains (Type), WonderProductionModifier integer DEFAULT 0, LandAirDefenseBonus integer DEFAULT 0, DiploMissionInfluence integer DEFAULT 0, PlagueID integer DEFAULT -1, PlaguePriority integer DEFAULT 0, OpenFromMod integer DEFAULT 0, RoughFromMod integer DEFAULT 0, NoSupply boolean DEFAULT 0, StackedGreatGeneralXP integer DEFAULT 0, GoodyHutYieldBonus integer DEFAULT 0, GainsXPFromScouting boolean DEFAULT 0, GainsXPFromPillaging boolean DEFAULT 0, GainsXPFromSpotting boolean DEFAULT 0, MultiAttackBonus integer DEFAULT 0, DamageReductionCityAssault integer DEFAULT 0, IsConvertOnDamage boolean DEFAULT 0, IsConvertOnFullHP boolean DEFAULT 0, ConvertDamageOrFullHPUnit text REFERENCES Units (Type), DamageThreshold integer DEFAULT 0, IsConvertEnemyUnitToBarbarian boolean DEFAULT 0, PillageBonusStrength integer DEFAULT 0, ReligiousPressureModifier integer DEFAULT 0, AdjacentCityDefenseMod integer DEFAULT 0, NearbyEnemyDamage integer DEFAULT 0, AdjacentEnemySapMovement integer DEFAULT 0, MilitaryProductionModifier integer DEFAULT 0, NoAdjacentUnitMod integer DEFAULT 0, NoAttackInOcean boolean DEFAULT 0, AuraRangeChange integer DEFAULT 0, AuraEffectChange integer DEFAULT 0, BorderMod integer DEFAULT 0, MarriageMod integer DEFAULT 0, MarriageModCap integer DEFAULT 0, CombatModPerLevel integer DEFAULT 0, DamageTakenMod integer DEFAULT 0, InfluenceFromCombatXpTimes100 integer DEFAULT 0, FreeAttackMoves boolean DEFAULT 0, CapitalDefenseLimit integer DEFAULT 0, VsUnhappyMod integer DEFAULT 0, PillageFortificationsOnKill boolean DEFAULT 0, AttackModPerSamePromotionAttack integer DEFAULT 0, AttackModPerSamePromotionAttackCap integer DEFAULT 0, CombatModPerCSAlliance integer DEFAULT 0, AoEHealOnPillage integer DEFAULT 0, ExtraXPOnKill integer DEFAULT 0, XPFromPillaging integer DEFAULT 0, CannotHeal boolean DEFAULT 0, FortifiedModifier integer DEFAULT 0, TileDamageIfNotMoved integer DEFAULT 0, RequiresLeadership boolean DEFAULT 0, MinEffectiveHealth integer DEFAULT 0, CanCrossIce boolean DEFAULT 0, CanCrossMountains boolean DEFAULT 0, CanCrossOceans boolean DEFAULT 0, EmbarkedDeepWater boolean DEFAULT 0, NearbyImprovementCombatBonus integer DEFAULT 0, NearbyImprovementBonusRange integer DEFAULT 0, CombatBonusImprovement text REFERENCES Improvements (Type), RankList text, RankNumber integer DEFAULT 0, FlagPromoOrder integer DEFAULT 0, SimpleHelpText boolean DEFAULT 0, ShowInUnitPanel boolean DEFAULT 1, IsVisibleAboveFlag boolean DEFAULT 1, foreign key (Description) references Language_en_US(Tag), foreign key (Help) references Language_en_US(Tag), foreign key (IconAtlas) references IconTextureAtlases(Atlas), foreign key (TechPrereq) references Technologies(Type), foreign key (Invisible) references InvisibleInfos(Type), foreign key (SeeInvisible) references InvisibleInfos(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereq) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr1) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr2) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr3) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr4) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr5) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr6) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr7) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr8) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PromotionPrereqOr9) references UnitPromotions(Type), foreign key (PediaEntry) references Language_en_US(Tag))
